verses.verse: Maschil <S%H4905><s%> of <S%H623>Asaph.<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> hast thou cast us <S%H2186>off<s%> <S%H5331>forever?<s%> why doth thine <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H6225>smoke<s%> against the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of thy <S%H4830>pasture?<s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> thy <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> which thou hast <S%H7069>purchased<s%> of <S%H6924>old;<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of thine <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> which thou hast <S%H1350>redeemed;<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> wherein thou hast <S%H7931>dwelt.<s%>

Lift <S%H7311>up<s%> thy <S%H6471>feet<s%> unto the <S%H5331>perpetual<s%> <S%H4876>desolations;<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H341>enemy<s%> hath done <S%H7489>wickedly<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
Thine <S%H6887>enemies<s%> <S%H7580>roar<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thy <S%H4150>congregations;<s%> they set <S%H7760>up<s%> their <S%H226>ensigns<s%> for <S%H226>signs.<s%>
A man was <S%H3045>famous<s%> according as he had lifted <S%H935>up<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H7134>axes<s%> upon the <S%H5442>thick<s%> <S%H6086>trees.<s%>
But <S%H6258>now<s%> they break <S%H1986>down<s%> the carved <S%H6603>work<s%> thereof at <S%H3162>once<s%> with <S%H3781>axes<s%> and <S%H3597>hammers.<s%>

They have <S%H7971>cast<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> into thy <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> they have <S%H2490>defiled<s%> by casting down the dwelling <S%H4908>place<s%> of thy <S%H8034>name<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> in their <S%H3820>hearts,<s%> Let us <S%H3238>destroy<s%> them <S%H3162>together:<s%> they have burned <S%H8313>up<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4150>synagogues<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

We <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> our <S%H226>signs:<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> any <S%H5030>prophet:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is there <S%H854>among<s%> us any that <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> how <S%H5704>long.<s%> <S%H4100><s%>

O <S%H430>God,<s%> how <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> shall the <S%H6862>adversary<s%> <S%H2778>reproach?<s%> shall the <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H5006>blaspheme<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5331>forever?<s%>
Why <S%H4100><s%> <S%H7725>withdrawest<s%> thou thy <S%H3027>hand,<s%> even thy right <S%H3225>hand?<s%> <S%H3615>pluck<s%> it out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H7130><s%> thy <S%H2436>bosom.<s%>
For <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H4480>old,<s%> <S%H6924><s%> <S%H6466>working<s%> <S%H3444>salvation<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> didst <S%H6565>divide<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> by thy <S%H5797>strength:<s%> thou didst <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H8577>dragons<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> didst <S%H7533>break<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H3882>leviathan<s%> in pieces, and <S%H5414>gavest<s%> him to be <S%H3978>meat<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> inhabiting the <S%H6728>wilderness.<s%>
Thou <S%H859><s%> didst <S%H1234>cleave<s%> the <S%H4599>fountain<s%> and the <S%H5158>flood:<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> driedst <S%H3001>up<s%> <S%H386>mighty<s%> <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>
The <S%H3117>day<s%> is thine, the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> is thine: <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H3559>prepared<s%> the <S%H3974>light<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>
Thou <S%H859><s%> hast <S%H5324>set<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1367>borders<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H3335>made<s%> <S%H7019>summer<s%> and <S%H2779>winter.<s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> that the <S%H341>enemy<s%> hath <S%H2778>reproached,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and that the <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H5006>blasphemed<s%> thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

O <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of thy <S%H8449>turtledove<s%> unto the <S%H2416>multitude<s%> of the wicked: <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H2416>congregation<s%> of thy <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H5331>forever.<s%>

Have <S%H5027>respect<s%> unto the <S%H1285>covenant:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the dark <S%H4285>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of the <S%H4999>habitations<s%> of <S%H2555>cruelty.<s%>
O let <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H1790>oppressed<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H3637>ashamed:<s%> let the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> plead thine own <S%H7378>cause:<s%> <S%H7379><s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H4480>how<s%> the foolish <S%H5036>man<s%> <S%H2781>reproacheth<s%> thee <S%H3605>daily.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

Forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thine <S%H6887>enemies:<s%> the <S%H7588>tumult<s%> of those that rise up <S%H6965>against<s%> thee <S%H5927>increaseth<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
